name: apiiptvparser
description: apiiptvparser is a powerful tool for extracting information from IPTV playlists. It provides the following features: - Retrieve all channels, movies, and series. - Calculate the total number of channels. - Calculate the total number of movies. - Calculate the total number of series. - Calculate the total number of channels per category. - Calculate the total number of movies per category. - Calculate the total number of series per category. - Search and display information about a channel, movie, or series based on the name.
author: Your Name
